name: Balancer yBAL Stable Pool
description: This token represents a Balancer liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Balancer's gauges to earn BAL emissions. This stable pool contains yBAL and BAL. BAL is Balancer's governance token, and yBAL is Yearn's new liquid veBAL wrapper, redesigned from the ground up to give users 'the best BAL yields in DeFi'.
